title: Arjun Baljee appointed president of Royal Orchid Hotels
description: Arjun Baljee appointed as president of Royal Orchid Hotels, leading the company's growth from 2 to 10 hotels. Chander K Baljee, chairman, praises Baljee's leadership for future expansion plans.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
